text: Stephen Owusu (26 October 1982 – 24 October 2020) was a Ghanaian footballer. He played for Kenyan Premier League side Tusker as a striker.James Situma moves on after Tusker rejection‚ goal.com, 22 December 2017 Owusu was born in Prestea, Ghana. He made one appearance for the national team in 2003. From 2006 to 2010, he played with the Heart of Lions. His career lasted from 2001 to 2017. Owusu died on 24 October 2020 from a long-illness in Accra, aged 37. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ghanaian footballers
title: Stephen Owusu
